SEARCH
Package fr.cyu.cybooks.models

Class Loan

java.lang.Object
fr.cyu.cybooks.models.Loan
public class Loan extends Object
Represents a loan of a book to a user.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Constructs a Loan object with the specified book, user, and maximum loan seconds.

  • Constructor Details

    • Loan

      public Loan(int id, User user, Book book, LocalDateTime loanDate, LocalDateTime dueDate, LocalDateTime returnDate)
      Constructs a Loan object with the specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the loan
      user - the user who borrowed the book
      book - the book being borrowed
      loanDate - the date when the book was borrowed
      dueDate - the due date for returning the book
      returnDate - the date when the book was returned (null if not returned yet)

    • Loan

      public Loan(Book book, User user)
      Constructs a Loan object with the specified book and user. The loan date is set to the current date and the due date is calculated based on the maximum loan days of the book.
      Parameters:
      book - the book being borrowed
      user - the user who borrowed the book

    • Loan

      public Loan(Book book, User user, int maxLoanSeconds)
      Constructs a Loan object with the specified book, user, and maximum loan seconds. The loan date is set to the current date and the due date is calculated based on the specified maximum loan seconds.
      Parameters:
      book - the book being borrowed
      user - the user who borrowed the book
      maxLoanSeconds - the maximum duration of the loan in seconds
